Class OperationsOffice

java.lang.Object
  OperationsOffice

public class OperationsOffice
extends Object

The centralized operations office of Victoria Airways.

Version:
2017-01-16
Author:
Maas Lalani, Jenisha Thomas, Ming Zhao Huang

Constructor Detail

OperationsOffice

public OperationsOffice(int maximumNumberOfCustomers,
                        int maximumNumberOfFlights,
                        int maximumNumberOfPlanes)
Constructs an operations office with the specified information.

Parameters:
maximumNumberOfFlights - the maximum number of flights this operations office can store
pre-condition: maximumNumberOfFlights must be greater than 0
maximumNumberOfPlanes - the maximum number of planes this operations office can store
pre-condition: maximumNumberOfPlanes must be greater than 0
maximumNumberOfCustomers - the maximum number of customers this operations office can store
pre-condition: maximumNumberOfCustomers must be greater than 0

Adds a passenger to the customer database of this operation office, if they aren't already registerd.

Parameters:

pre-condition: passenger may not be null
Returns:
whether the operation was successful

boardPassengers

public void boardPassengers()
Adds existing passengers and their cargo in the database to their corresponding flights, to ensure that no two same seats are reserved when booking a flight.

createTicket

public Ticket createTicket(Passenger passenger,
                           String departure,
                           String destination)
Creates a ticket for flight with the specified departure and destination for the specified passenger if such a flight exists in this operation office flight database.

Parameters:
passenger - the passenger to make the ticket for
pre-condition: passenger may not be null
departure - the departure of the passenger's trip pre-condition: departure may not null
destination - the destination of the passenger's trip pre-condition: destination may not null
Returns:
the ticket made to reserve the passenger's seat

loadCustomerData

public Passenger[] loadCustomerData(String textFile)
Reads passenger data from the specified text file and creates a customer database for this operation office.

Parameters:
textFile - the name of the textFile
textFile may not be null
Returns:
an array of the passengers created from data found in the specified text file

loadDatabases

public void loadDatabases(String customerFile,
                          String planeFile,
                          String flightFile)
Reads flight, passenger and plane data from specified text files and intializes the databases of this operations office, ensuring that all passengers have been added to their flight.

Parameters:
customerFile - the text file containing the customer data
pre-condition: customerFile may not be null
planeFile - the text file containing the plane data.
pre-condition: planeFile may not be null
flightFile - the textfile containing the flight data
pre-condition: flightFile may not be null

loadFlightData

public Flight[] loadFlightData(String textFile)
Reads flight data from a text file and creates a flight database for this operations office.

Parameters:
textFile - the file to be read from
pre-condition: textfile may not be null

loadPlaneData

public Plane[] loadPlaneData(String textFile)
Reads plane data from the specified text file and creates a plane database for this operation office.

Parameters:
textFile - the name of the textFile
textFile may not be null
Returns:
an array of the planes created from data found in the specified text file

scheduleFlight

public Flight scheduleFlight(String flightName,
                             double cost,
                             String date,
                             String destination,
                             String departure)
Schedules a flight from the specified departure to destination at the specifed date with the specified cost if an unscheduled plane matching it's range and departure is found.

Parameters:
flightName - the name of this flight
pre-condition: flightName may not be null
cost - the cost of this flight
pre-condition cost cannot be negative
date - the takeoff date of this flight
pre-condition: date may not be null
destination - the destination of this flight
pre-condition: destination may not be null
departure - the departure of this flight
pre-condition: departure may not be null
Returns:
the scheduled flight, if required plane is present otherwise null

setCustomers

public void setCustomers(Passenger[] customer)
Sets the customers record of this operations office.

Parameters:
customer - the array which contains the information for customers of Victoria Airlines
pre-condition: customer may not be null

setFlights

public void setFlights(Flight[] flight)
Sets the flights record of this operations office.

Parameters:
flight - the array which contains the information for flights of Victoria Airlines
pre-condition: flight may not be null

setPlanes

public void setPlanes(Plane[] plane)
Sets the planes record of this operations office.

Parameters:
plane - the array which contains the information for flights of Victoria Airlines
pre-condition: plane may not be null
